title: Talqin Dying Person
description: Authentic supplications for Talqin Dying Person
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Talqin Dying Person. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua ar_7esn_AlMoslem_by_Doors_053
items.arabic: ((مَنْ كَانَ آخِرُ كَلاَمِهِ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ دَخَلَ الْجَنَّةَ)).
